common.no_clans_found:
No clans were found on this server for the specified input! 
Use {{command}} command to link a clan.
common.no_clans_linked:
No clans are linked to this server. Why not link some? 
Use {{command}} command to link a clan.
common.clan_limit:
The maximum number of clans has reached. Please consider supporting us on our [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to add more than two clans.

Already subscribed? Use {{command}} command.
common.patreon_only:
This command is only available on Patreon subscribed servers. Please consider supporting us on our [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to use this command.

Already subscribed? Use {{command}} command.
common.clan_verification:
We need to ensure that you are a leader or co-leader of this clan. Please verify your player account with the API token.
Use the {{command}} command to verify your player account. The API token is available in the Game settings.
common.no_option: Er is iets misgegaan tijdens het uitvoeren van deze opdracht. (optie niet gevonden)
common.no_data: Op dit moment zijn er geen gegevens beschikbaar. We zijn ze nog aan het verzamelen!
common.no_clan_data: Er zijn geen gegevens beschikbaar voor {{clan}}. We zijn nog aan het verzamelen!
common.fetch_failed: Er is iets misgegaan tijdens het ophalen van gegevens uit de API.

component.expired: This component is no longer active. Execute the command again.
component.unauthorized: You must execute the command to interact with the components.

common.no_clan_tag_first_time: You must provide a clan tag to execute this command!
common.no_clan_tag:
You must provide a clan tag to execute this command! 
Alternatively, you can link a default clan to your profile using the {{command}} command.
common.no_player_tag:
You must provide a player tag to execute this command!, 
Alternatively, you can link some accounts to your profile using the {{command}} command.
common.clan_not_linked:
No clan is linked to {{user}}. 
Use {{command}} to link a clan.
common.player_not_linked: No player is linked to {{user}}. Use {{command}} command to link a player.
common.guild_unauthorized: This server is not authorized for {{clan}}. Use {{command}} command to link a clan.

status_code.400: An unknown error occurred while handling the request (400)
status_code.403: An unknown error occurred while handling the request (403)
status_code.404: Er zijn geen resultaten gevonden voor de opgegeven tag.
status_code.429: An unknown error occurred while handling the request (429)
status_code.500: An unknown error occurred while handling the request (typically happens during the season reset in the game)
status_code.503: Service is temporarily unavailable because of the maintenance break in the game.
status_code.504: An unknown error occurred while handling the request (504)

common.maintenance_start: De onderbreking wegens onderhoud is begonnen!
common.maintenance_end: The maintenance break is ending soon! {{duration}}
common.something_went_wrong: Er is iets misgegaan tijdens het uitvoeren van deze opdracht.
common.missing_access: The bot is missing {{permission}} in {{channel}} to execute this command.
common.missing_manager_role: You are missing the **Manage Server** permission or the [Bot Manager](<https://docs.clashperk.com/others/bot-manager>) role to perform this action.
common.no_match_found: No matches were found with the tag {{tag}}

refresh.description_long: Refresh roles manually. (Use this command if the roles are not updated automatically)

user_or_role.description: Refresh an individual user or a role.

is_test_run.description: Test run to see the changes without applying.

role_addition_delays.description: Whether to delay the addition of roles.

allow_not_linked.description: Whether to allow not linked players to get roles.

verified_only_clan_roles.description: Whether to grant clans roles to verified players only.
